nodes.bodyText: Is this cycle or higher (next higher)? or just next (to me this looks like getting the higher difficulty)?

It seems to cycle as follows:
int newOrdinal = (oldOrdinal + 1) % Difficulty.values().length

So cycle probably make sense there
